data.content: My first subscription-based internet product focuses on cash flow management, allowing users to record income, expenses, and budgets, and generate monthly reports. It also includes a feature to scan grocery receipts and track income or expenses.

I completely rebuilt the insurance broker system from the ground up due to the old system's unmanageability. The new system efficiently assists brokers in cross-checking data between banks and insurance companies, ensuring accuracy and streamlined operations.
I created a website to manage mining income and expenses, including budgeting operational costs and managing permits.

I developed a ticketing and raffle system with a payment gateway for the Karcisbola app. While the ticketing system is not fully utilized yet, I also researched various cloud options to minimize deployment costs for both staging and production environments.

After a year, I became a Full-Stack Developer managing various projects. While I occasionally develop mobile apps with Flutter, I primarily focus on backend development, utilizing Node.js for robust and scalable server-side solutions.

My journey as a web developer began at this company, where I gained extensive experience and knowledge. Working in the Software House sector, I mastered coding and had opportunities to interact with clients from both the government and private sectors.
